text: Yitora binimayata sihamte nijake bikrai kirache seya kimana ye, nikrsta! Seya haiche, allahe yi aratirna karaiche, sihamte tara lagata kupharai karaiche, e'i jidara basararti hai ye, allahe te'omra bandasakalara majara paraa yaka iccha tara oparata te'omra anugraha aratirna karae. Seye sihamta kraodhara oparata kraodha arjana karaiche arau kaphirasakalara babe ache lanchanadayaka sasti
